title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the desired features, target audience, technical specifications, and performance goals for the AI audio mastering tool. Consider factors such as audio file formats, real-time processing capabilities, integration with existing digital audio workstations (DAWs), and compatibility with various operating systems and hardware configurations. Also, gather requirements for the AI model training process, data sources, and model deployment strategies.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI model, audio processing pipeline, and user interface components.

title: Develop AI Model for Audio Mastering
description: Research, design, and implement the AI model responsible for analyzing and mastering audio files.

title: Implement Audio Processing Pipeline
description: Develop the audio processing pipeline that integrates the AI model and handles audio file input/output, format conversions, and other necessary operations.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the AI audio mastering tool, including the ability to upload audio files, configure mastering settings, and preview/export the mastered audio.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the application follows best practices for security, including user authentication, data encryption, and protection against common vulnerabilities.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AI audio mastering tool, covering installation, usage, and troubleshooting.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute thorough testing of the application, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure high quality and functionality.
dependencies: Develop AI Model for Audio Mastering
